subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James, who had missed three games with a strained hamstring, had 27 points as the Heat moved closer to securing home-court advantage for the entire N.B.A. playoffs.
snippet: LeBron James, who had missed three games with a strained hamstring, had 27 points as the Heat moved closer to securing home-court advantage for the entire N.B.A. playoffs.
